_header: Of these friar minors me thinks much wonder
_description: Against the Minorite Friars — seven 6-line stanzas (aabbcc) with an ‘O and I’ refrain

BLCottCleoBII.First Lines:
Of þes frere mynours me thenkes moch wonderÞat waxen are
                    þus hauteyn þat som tyme weren vnder…
BLCottCleoBII.Last Lines:
…With an O & an I ffor sixe pens er þai fayleSle
                    þi fadre & iape þi modre & þai wyl þe
                    assoile
